guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3582l","text":"The DNeasy columns cannot take more than 5 x 106 cells per column. Larger pellets can be split into multiple extraction reactions, then combined after elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
